game.name: Not Your Eyes
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Your eyes cannot be trusted. A girl finds herself questioned by a twisted psychiatrist, helping a fallen angel, and followed by a bizarre stalker, descending to a beautiful, terrible world where nothing is as it seems.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your eyes cannot be trusted. A girl finds herself questioned by a twisted psychiatrist, helping a fallen angel, and followed by a bizarre stalker, descending to a beautiful, terrible world where nothing is as it seems.
